Posts.Content: hi babs im on tamoxafen and i kept getting urine inf i had 2 within 4 wks but all seems to have settled water works wise but i kept getting pains when i went for a wee so sent me for ultrasound and found i had a cyst on my ovarie that was causing the problem when i asked could it be the tamoxafen the dr replied it could well be as it is one of the side effects i have to go for re scan in 5 weeks to see what cyst is doing but told me it wasnt cancerous thank godness i know exactly how you are feeling we get over one thing and some think else happens keep your chin up xxx
Posts.Title: bladder problams on tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: hi franoli i have lymphodema around the area i had lymph nodes removed i also have it in my breast and back dont feel stupid asking questions its your body and you need to know other wise you will just worry hope all goes well xx
